title: Iconic Barrenjoey House in Palm Beach
description: The newly re-opened Barrenjoey House-yes, the iconic heritage property perched above the 100-year-old Barrenjoey House Restaurant-is making waves due to its recent renovation by hospitality brand, The Boathouse Group. Coastal meets Sydney elegance in one of New South Wales' favourite holiday spots. This romantic, adults-only escape includes a welcome cocktail and bottle of wine on arrival, guaranteed late 12pm checkout and a AU$50 gift card for Breakfast to spend at the area’s favourite waterfront cafe The Boathouse Palm Beach.

title: Luxurious Self-Contained Palm Beach Home Across from Beach with Private Pool & Sauna
description:
Have the time of your life with an utterly luxurious retreat at the fully self-contained Nirvana Palm Beach homestay, just metres from the sparkling Gold Coast foreshore. Ideal for groups of adults, this impressive property boasts five contemporarily styled private bedrooms, three and a half bathrooms, a full kitchen plus a kitchenette/bar and three comfortable living spaces - all designed to facilitate a relaxing and opulent escape.

A stone’s throw from restaurants and stores, the practically beachfront location of the property is only further enhanced by its unique modern Mediterranean feel, private plunge pool, sauna and garden areas - perfect for entertaining. For high-end luxury incorporating the best of the coast and the city, Nirvana Palm Beach is paramount.
offer_address: 1464 Gold Coast Highway, Palm Beach 4221, Queensland

title: Barrenjoey House Waterfront Oasis in Palm Beach with $50 Dining Credit
description:
Exchange Sydney bustle for Palm Beach serenity at the waterside oasis of Barrenjoey House - an elegant heritage property boasting 100 years of old-world charm, and a Northern Beaches icon since its 1920s heyday. Part of the renowned Boathouse Group, the property is just an hour north of Sydney CBD, and enjoys access to some of Sydney's most pristine beaches as well as the boatowner's paradise that is the tranquil Pittwater inlet, making for a convenient coastal escape. The guesthouse's innovative heritage restaurant makes the most of its prime location, serving modern Australian cuisine with a focus on locally sourced seafood and seasonal produce.

Unwind in the guesthouse's airy, light-drenched interiors, indulge in sea-fresh oysters at the onsite restaurant or venture out to discover untouched bays, the popular Home & Away beach and an infinite stretch of coastal trails that will keep any nature enthusiast satisfied.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- A$50 food and drink credit per room to enjoy at The Boathouse Palm Beach
- Enjoy a complimentary bottle of wine during your stay
- Unwind with a welcome cocktail
- Make the most of your final day with a leisurely 12pm late checkout

**Pittwater Loft Upgrade:** Turn up the luxury staying in the spacious, 52sqm Loft located on the top floor, boasting an open plan layout with a bedroom, living area and sitting area where you can gaze over the sparkling waters.

**Dining Experience:** Choose the dinner upgrade and savour a delicious three-course dinner overlooking stunning ocean vistas at Barrenjoey House restaurant.
offer_address: 1108 Barrenjoey Road, Palm Beach 2108, New South Wales, Australia

title: Breezy Palm Beach Escape
description: Exchange Sydney bustle for Palm Beach serenity at the waterside oasis of Barrenjoey House - an elegant heritage property boasting 100 years of old-world charm. Unwind in the airy, light-drenched interior, indulge in oysters at the onsite restaurant or venture out to discover untouched bays, the popular Home & Away beach and an infinite stretch of coastal trails to keep any nature enthusiast satisfied.

title: Boutique Coastal Escape in Sydney's Affluent Palm Beach
description: Explore the sun-kissed, famous, blue waters of Sydney’s Northern Beaches with a stay at the boutique, iconic Barrenjoey House Palm Beach. This oasis boasts a relaxed coastal atmosphere and accompanies the Barrenjoey House restaurant and terrace, which showcases modern Australian flavours, fresh seafood and refreshing cocktails. After a day at the beach, you'll be thrilled to return to this idyllic accommodation and put your feet up in the shared lounge.
offer_address: 1108 Barrenjoey Road, Palm Beach 2108, New South Wales, Australia
